message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, my budget is limited and I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $11,000. My maximum budget is $10,000. I am willing to offer $10,000 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $10,800. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. However, I am still unable to meet you at $10,800. My budget remains at $10,000. I am willing to offer $10,000 for the product.
